Synthesis of a novel imidazoli cited by_.title: Preparation and Characterization of Tetra-Imidazolium Hydroxide Polyphenylene Membranes via Nickel Catalyzed C–C Coupling Polymerization
Synthesis of a novel imidazoli cited by_.abstract:
Imidazolium hydroxide anion exchange membranes functionalized with conjugated
tetraphenylethylene moieties were synthesized via Ni (0) catalyzed polymerization by …
